name: Dynamodels
desc: Typescript overlay to easily interact with DynamoDB. Fluid synthax library offering pagination, auto-escape of reserved words and many more.

name: Azure JWT Lite
desc: Lightweight (<320kb unzipped) library to validate Microsoft AzureAD. Written in typescript fully-tested with 100% code coverage

name: Sentenza
desc: Sentenza helps you to trigger CI pipelines. From a script, another pipeline, your laptop... no matter. Sentenza always follow his job through. You know that.

name: Bringgle
desc: Real-time collaborative shareable check-lists. Made with Express/Vue/Mongo stack. Will deploy it on a Kubernetes cluster if I find some time to do so.
